description: About 156 people on a German rescue ship off Sicily must undergo health checks on another vessel.
title: Coronavirus: Italy orders rescued migrants onto quarantine ship
title_page: Coronavirus: Italy orders rescued migrants onto quarantine ship - BBC News
maintext: Earlier this month, the EU's top court - the European Court of Justice - ruled that Poland, Hungary and the Czech Republic had broken EU law by refusing to take in refugees under an agreement to ease the burden faced by Italy and Greece.
